statements: SELECT * FROM GameEvents WHERE player_id = 1;

SELECT event_name, event_date, game_id, achievement_name, bonus_amount FROM game_events JOIN achievements ON game_events.game_id = achievements.game_id JOIN rewards ON achievements.achievement_id = rewards.achievement_id WHERE game_id = 1;
